content.rendered:
Home

Schools

Regent College London boasts 3 schools of excellence; all will a high standard of teaching and engaging course subjects. We have 20 years of experience within the education sector and Regent College London has provided Higher Education Courses for 10 years. We have continued to excel in our teaching methods. Students past and present have embedded valuable life and educational learnings to aid success in everyday life. Regent College London are proud to provide an inclusive higher education environment fulfilled with a diverse range of students.

Schools

School of Business and Enterprise

School of Allied Health

School of Computing and AI
